snippet: Investors pulled cash out of stock mutual funds for the fifth consecutive month in July, while bond funds again attracted new cash, new statistics showed Friday.
abstract: Statistics show that investors pulled cash out of stock mutual funds for the fifth consecutive month in July, while bond funds once again attracted new cash.
lead_paragraph: Investors pulled cash out of stock mutual funds for the fifth consecutive month in July, while bond funds again attracted new cash, new statistics showed Friday.

headline.main: Equity Funds Shrink as Investors Move To Bonds
headline.print_headline: Equity Funds Shrink as Investors Move To Bonds
